title: Sign up
name: signUpAdmin
description: Sign up a new OpenBadges-Admin. (Only a logged in Admin can create a new Admin account.)

Header.description: allows to send a valid JSON Web Token along with this request with Bearer prefix.

Parameter.description: full first name of the admin; must consist of at least 6 characters
full last name of the admin; must consist of at least 6 characters
the admin's place of residence; must consist of at least 2 characters
the postal code of the admin's place of residence; minimum 01067, maximal 99998
the birthday of the admin
the email for the admin
the username for the admin; it is used for signing in
the desired password for the admin; must consist of at least 6 characters
confirm the desired password for the admin; must consist the same string as password

title: Assigne a Badge
name: assigneLocalBadge
description: Assigne a Badge to a specified user.

Header.description: allows to send a valid JSON Web Token along with this request with Bearer prefix.

Parameter.description: the ID of the Badge you are referring to
the ID of the Course you are referring to
the ID of the user you are referring to

Success 200.description: Local Badge is assigned successfully to user. or GLobal Badge is assigned successfully to user.

On error.description: {"message": "Local Badge is already assigned to user."} or {"message": "Global Badge is already assigned to user."}
{"message": "No permission assigning the Badge to an user."}

title: Deregister me
name: courseSignOut
description: Deregister a user in a course, if the user was registered.

Parameter.description: the ID of the course you are referring to

Header.description: allows to send a valid JSON Web Token along with this request with Bearer prefix.

Parameter.description: name of the course
the ObjectId of global badges for the course (min: 1); example: ["5e1b0bafeafe4a84c4ac31a9"]
the ObjectId of local badges for the Course (min: 1); example: ["5e1b0bafeafe4a84c4ac31a9"]
the provider of the course might be specified by the creator
postalcode of the building where the course take place
adress of the location from the Course
coordinates of the location from the Course; example: [7, 52]
topic of the Course
a brief summary about the course contents
a brief summary about the course requirements
Date of the start of the course
Date of the end of the course
maximal amount of the course participants
the ID of the course you are referring to

title: Get Courses
name: getCourses
description: Get all courses respectivly get courses by different parameters.

Parameter.description: course name
coordinates in which radius might be an course; example: [7, 52]
radius [in km] about a pair of coordinates
greater (or equal) than the startdate of the course
lower (or equal) than the enddate of the course
course topic

On error.description: {"message": "No courses found using the specified parameters."}
{"message": "To filter courses in a certain radius, the parameters "coordinates" and "radius" are required."}

adress of the location from the Course
coordinates of the location from the Course; example: [7, 52]
topic of the Course

title: Refresh token
name: refreshToken
description: Refresh the authorization, if the refresh token is valid.

Parameter.description: the refresh token

On error.description: {"message": "Refresh token is invalid or too old. Please sign in with your user credentials."}
{"message": "Complications during querying the database or creating a JWT."}

title: Refresh token
name: refreshToken
description: Refresh the authorization, if the refresh token is valid.

Parameter.description: the refresh token

On error.description: {"message": "Refresh token is invalid or too old. Please sign in with your user credentials."}
{"message": "Complications during querying the database or creating a JWT."}

title: Request reset password
name: requestResetPassword
description: Requests a password reset (in case of forgotten password). A link to reset the password will then be sent in an email, which is valid for 12 hours.

Parameter.description: the username of the user; it is used for sending the email with all instructions

On error.description: Complications during sending the email with all instructions to reset the password.

Parameter.description: token to reset password sent through email
the new desired password for the user; must consist of at least 6 characters
confirm the new desired password for the user; must consist the same string as password
the username of the user
the password of the user

On error.description: {"message": "Complications during querying the database or creating a JWT."}

title: Sign out
name: signOut
description: Signs the user out, if JSON Web Token is valid. Invalidates the current JSON Web Token.

Header.description: allows to send a valid JSON Web Token along with this request with Bearer prefix.

On error.description: {"message": "JSON Web Token is invalid. Please sign in with your user credentials."}
{"message": "Complications during querying the database or creating the JWT."}
